name: Iku: The Lost Ronin
description:
Iku: The Lost Ronin  is a 3D Storrytelling game with a nice Low Poly look.
You play as Iku who finds himself in the underworld.
His goal is to find someone he lost andyou will help him on his way. Mouse and Keybopard Walk - W / A / S / D Look - Mouse Interact - F Controller Walk - Left Stick Look - Right Stick Interact - West Button / South Button
Created by Nayu Grass Shader inspired by nappin
